about_the_game:
Takki Jump is a challenging 3D-platformer with raging potential.

But what the hell is a Takki and why would it even jump? Find out in Takki Jump!
In this first person jump and run you slip into the role of a Takki and accompany him on the biggest journey of his life. Master difficult jumps and show nerves of steel. Compare your performance with Takkis all over the world and try to climb the leaderboard by becoming faster and better.

Gameplay:
Jump through different themed levels with increasing difficulty, jump on different platforms with special effects and solve small puzzles to enjoy the cute story this game has in store for you.

What this game offers you:
  • 7 unique and challenging level
  • A Jump and Run from first person perspective
  • Extremely difficult jumps and challenges
  • A thrilling and funny story
  • Collectibles all over the world
  • Steam leaderboards to set new records and beat old ones

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 Ti
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 13
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.7
  • Processor: Intel only
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 13.6
  • Processor: Intel only
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

name: Takki Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIndows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Do you love real challenges and platform games? Then immerse yourself in the world of a Takki. Master difficult jumps and find hidden collectibles. You need jumping skills and a chill head to accompany the Takki on his journey.
